data.comment: The match is underway. Atletico Mineiro have kicked-off.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Ceara.
Free kick Ceara.
Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Ceara.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Raphael Claus signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Ceara's half.
Ceara's Felipe Vizeu gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 15, Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Atletico Mineiro are coming forward and Keno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Raphael Claus awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 20, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 23, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Ceara's Tiago has been booked in Fortaleza.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Ceara.
Bruno Pacheco (Ceara) has received a yellow card from Raphael Claus.
In the minute 29, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Eduardo Sasha is on target to give Atletico Mineiro a 0-1 advantage.
Igor Rabello with an assist there.
In the minute 32, Ceara have a goal kick.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Guilherme Arana of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Raphael Claus awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Atletico Mineiro needs to be cautious. Ceara have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 38, Ceara to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ceara advance rapidly upfield but Raphael Claus blows for offside.
In the minute 39, Leo Chu is replacing Charles for the home team.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Ceara.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 41, Guilherme Arana for Atletico Mineiro has been booked by Raphael Claus and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 43, Ceara's Leo Chu misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Atletico Mineiro will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Ceara.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Tiago (Ceara) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half has come to a close in Fortaleza.
It's Ceara with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Castelao.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Vinicius Lima is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 48, Great play from Leo Chu to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Keno (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 53, Ceara have a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Jefferson Savarino's finish is wide of the goal.
Raphael Claus awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 55, In Fortaleza Atletico Mineiro attack through Dylan Borrero. The finish is off target, however.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Raphael Claus signals a Ceara throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
In the minute 56, Goal! Felipe Vizeu gives Ceara a 2-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Samuel Xavier.
Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a second substitution, with Cleber Bomfim replacing Felipe Vizeu.
In the minute 59, Fabinho for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Castelao with Marrony replacing Federico Zaracho.
In the minute 60, Keno of Atletico Mineiro is pulled up for offside.
Ceara's Vinicius Goes gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 62, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro just outside Ceara's area.
At Estadio Castelao, Samuel Xavier has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 64, Nathan is replacing Calebe for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Castelao.
The away team have replaced Talison Ruan Da Silva with Bueno. This is the third substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
Ceara are coming forward and Bruno Pacheco gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Raphael Claus awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Nathan's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in Ceara.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 70, Dylan Borrero (Atletico Mineiro) has been sent off!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
An attacking Atletico Mineiro player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 74, Keno levels the score at 2-2 from the penalty spot.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 76, Jefferson Savarino of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Ceara's Eduardo Brock has been booked in Fortaleza.
In the minute 79, Throw-in high up the field for Ceara in Fortaleza.
Vinicius Goes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ceara.
Keno for Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 80, Ceara have a goal kick.
In Fortaleza Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Guilherme Arana. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 83, Raphael Claus signals a throw-in for Atletico Mineiro, close to Ceara's area.
Klaus is replacing Tiago for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a fourth substitution, with Leandro Carvalho replacing Vinicius Lima.
In the minute 84, Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Castelao with Marquinhos replacing Jefferson Savarino.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Hyoran is on a sub for Eduardo Sasha for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 88, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Ceara.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
Important block from the Ceara defence as Marrony fires in a strike for Atletico Mineiro.
Vinicius Goes for the home team is judged to be offside.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Fortaleza.
Raphael Claus signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Ceara's half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Ceara.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Raphael Claus blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
